main event: A civilian witnessed a single fast-moving, reddish-orange object in the sky near Oakgrove, Oregon on June 29, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to suddenly accelerate, make a sharp turn, and then disappear.
The witness reported that they and two friends were walking home when they noticed the object.
The witness described the object as slightly reddish-orange in color.
A follow-up investigation by the Air Force attributed the sighting to a satellite decay that occurred around the same time.
